description:
Why do Packers fans always treat Aaron Rodgers like the victim

The NCAA needs to be more proactive to keep its top talent happy

Russell Wilson is responsible for a wave of QBs getting drafted

Guests: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First 

Chris Ballard, Colts GM
